item.title: How I became a cyborg pt2
item.description: This is part 2 of a series on how I became a cyborg. Warning: this article talks in details about heart surgery and shows post-op images. Read part 1 first We can rebuild him 2019-08-06: Waking up from heart surgery. The first thing I saw were my parents talking to a nurse. My parents wanted to leave but the nurse asked them to stay, saying “it’s better to have familiar faces when he wakes up”.
